select r.rs_date "rs_date", sum(ifnull(r.sales*p.prod_price, 0)) "maechul", sum(ifnull(r.consume*i.item_price, 0)) "jichul", (sum(ifnull(r.sales*p.prod_price, 0)))-(sum(ifnull(r.consume*i.item_price, 0))) "income" from result r left join product p on r.prod_num = p.prod_num left join stock s on r.stock_num = s.stock_num left join item i on s.item_num = i.item_num where r.num = #{num} group by r.rs_date order by r.rs_date desc limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
